data.text: Mndewa Imulungu komkaliza na kuwika goya ugima wake,
Mndewa Imulungu komgangamiza yahawasa mulusazi kokugula,
Niye nilonga, “Go Mndewa Imulungu, nyonela bazi,
Kila munhu yokwiza kundola kolonga uvizi,
Iwanhu wose onihila oinyong'onyela kunilema niye,
olonga, “Utamu wihile umgoga, heyo henuka kabili mulusazi.”
Lakini gweye, Mndewa Imulungu, unyonele bazi,
Avo nojuwa kamba konogezwa na niye,
Yatogolwe Mndewa Imulungu, Imulungu wa Izilaeli,
